ComicInfo.Summary:
When a group of sorority girls take a hazing stunt to far a pledge ends up dead. Claiming it was an accident the sisters escape punishment from the law but there was one thing they didn't count on...the pledge taking revenge from beyond the grave.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Antonio Bifulco & Sean Ellery | 1 | B | Cover B | Gregbo Watson & Marcelo Costa | 2 | C | Cover C | Mary Sanapo & Vinicius Andrade | 3 | D | Zenescope Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 300 | Jamie Tyndall (a) & Ivan Nunes (c) | Missing | Note: The digital edition (2/22/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
